name: Monster Match (jazibobs)
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 50.

A monster is going to destroy the city. You can try to stop him, but it's ultimately pointless...

Controls
  • On PC: Left click and drag to move the shapes around the board.
  • On mobile: Swipe on the shapes to move them around the board.
Troubleshooting

If you find any problems, please raise an issue on the GitHub repo for this project:
https://github.com/jazibobs/ldjam50/issues

Privacy

For Google Play - No personal or identifiable information is collect by this app.
